sources.title: Lifepod | FULL MOVIE | Sci-Fi Thriller
sources.description:
This futuristic retelling of Alfred Hitchcock's classic suspense thriller "Lifeboat" stars Robert Loggia ("Scarface") as a womanizing senator who becomes trapped on an escape pod with eight other passengers when their luxury space liner is destroyed by an unknown saboteur.

#thriller #scifi #hitchcock #future #futuristic #senator #escape #saboteur #fullmoviefree #movie #space #spacetravel #expanse

metadata.Plot: Lifepod chronicles the trip of eight passengers after the ship on which they were traveling blew up on Christmas Eve 2168. Immediately people start dying. The passengers begin to investigate why the ship blew up and how it relates to them.
metadata.Writer: Jay Roach, Pen Densham, Alfred Hitchcock
metadata.Actors: Robert Loggia, Jessica Tuck, Stan Shaw
